issue.title: Parts of stereo camera system transforms are wrong

content.raw: Fixed in pull request #36. The hackBaseline parameter had the wrong sign and the frame name of the right stereo camera was wrong (has to be the same frame as the left stereo cam). Both camera views in rviz now show correct projection of robot parts into images and stereo_image_proc works. The ground plane appears to be matched too far away from the robot, which might be related to gazebo issue #242 (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/242/drc-terrain-texture-warps-when-gazebo).
